audition.title: WHY
audition.detail: Love to dance? Love to kick? Love to turn? Love to smile? Love sports? Love school spirit? If so, you should audition for the Stanford Dollies!

audition.title: WHEN
audition.detail: Learn audition routines during Weeks 4 and 5 of Winter Quarter, and auditions take place throughout Week 6 of the quarter.

audition.title: WHERE
audition.detail: Audition workshops and the audition take place in the Dollie Room in the Band Shak (located near the Avery Aquatic Center).

audition.title: HOW
audition.detail: During the first round, two Dollie dances and a self choreographed solo is performed in front of current and past Dollies for the audition.

audition.title: FINALS
audition.detail: Dollie Day is the final round of auditions. The ProDos perform the dances one by one in front of the other Prodos and interview with Band.

audition.title: SPLASH
audition.detail: After becoming Dollies, the new Dollies have a couple of months to learn 10 dances before their first rally, “Dollie Splash,” in spring.
